name: Moen
description:
climb the mountain

take your time

make some friends

A little experimental multiplayer 3d platformer. You can climb, do activities, or offer a helping hand to those who struggle, it's all up to you. 

You automatically connect to the game server so you can play with your friends or others without much of a hassle. 

This is an early version of the game. The first 100 meters are fully completed. Unless you exploit the game and go to further unfinished areas ^^

A controller is heavily recommended. 

  

Join my discord channel so we can play together!!!
